description: Andrew is a very fit lad, he is tall, muscular and lean - a great combo - he does loads of sports, and it shows in his naturally athletic body. It's not long before he's wanking furiously before he shoots a big load over his hand, abs and leg, great shoot as always Andrew!
title: Bonus Video of Andrew's Photo Shoot - Tall, Straight Footballer Shows Off His Huge Uncut Erection
